3 namespace Ubiquity\scaffolding\creators;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
7 use Ubiquity\scaffolding\ScaffoldController;
8 
18 class AuthControllerCreator extends BaseControllerCreator {
19  private $baseClass;
20 
21  public function __construct($controllerName, $baseClass, $views = null, $routePath = "") {
22  parent::__construct ( $controllerName, $routePath, $views );
23  $this->baseClass = $baseClass;
24  }
25 
26  public function create(ScaffoldController $scaffoldController) {
27  $this->scaffoldController = $scaffoldController;
28  $classContent = "";
29  if ($this->baseClass == "\\Ubiquity\\controllers\\auth\\AuthController") {
30  $controllerTemplate = "authController.tpl";
31  $uses = [ "use Ubiquity\\utils\\http\\USession;","use Ubiquity\\utils\\http\\URequest;" ];
32  } else {
33  $controllerTemplate = "authController_.tpl";
34  $uses = [ ];
35  }
36  $controllerNS = $this->controllerNS;
37 
38  $messages = [ ];
39  $routeName = $this->controllerName;
40  if (isset ( $this->views )) {
41  $this->addViews ( $uses, $messages, $classContent );
42  }
43  if ($this->routePath != null) {
44  if (UString::isNotNull ( $this->routePath )) {
45  $routeName = $this->addRoute ( $this->routePath );
46  }
47  }
48  $uses = implode ( "\n", $uses );
49  $messages [] = $scaffoldController->_createController ( $this->controllerName, [ "%routeName%" => $routeName,"%route%" => $this->routePath,"%uses%" => $uses,"%namespace%" => $controllerNS,"%baseClass%" => $this->baseClass,"%content%" => $classContent ], $controllerTemplate );
50  echo implode ( "\n", $messages );
51  }
52 
53  protected function addViews(&$uses, &$messages, &$classContent) {
54  $scaffoldController = $this->scaffoldController;
55  $authControllerName = $this->controllerName;
56  $authViews = explode ( ",", $this->views );
57  $uses [] = "use controllers\\auth\\files\\{$authControllerName}Files;";
58  $uses [] = "use Ubiquity\\controllers\\auth\\AuthFiles;";
59  $classContent .= $scaffoldController->_createMethod ( "protected", "getFiles", "", ": AuthFiles", "\t\treturn new {$authControllerName}Files();" );
60  $classFilesContent = [ ];
61  foreach ( $authViews as $file ) {
62  if (isset ( ScaffoldController::$views ["auth"] [$file] )) {
63  $frameworkViewname = ScaffoldController::$views ["auth"] [$file];
64  $scaffoldController->createAuthCrudView ( $frameworkViewname, $authControllerName, $file );
65  $classFilesContent [] = $scaffoldController->_createMethod ( "public", "getView" . ucfirst ( $file ), "", "", "\t\treturn \"" . $authControllerName . "/" . $file . ".html\";" );
66  }
67  }
68  $messages [] = $this->createAuthFilesClass ( $scaffoldController, implode ( "", $classFilesContent ) );
69  }
70 
71  protected function createAuthFilesClass(ScaffoldController $scaffoldController, $classContent = "") {
72  $ns = Startup::getNS ( "controllers" ) . "auth\\files";
73  $uses = "\nuse Ubiquity\\controllers\\auth\\AuthFiles;";
74  return $scaffoldController->_createClass ( "class.tpl", $this->controllerName . "Files", $ns, $uses, "extends AuthFiles", $classContent );
75  }
76 }
